BIRDSOpenSource.github.io

Helping low-budget teams in non-space faring nations by providing a more solid basis for satellite development.

View the Project on GitHub

  • View On GitHub

Solar Panel Board

This is a simple PCB used to carry the solar cells and connect them to the satellite. There may be some difference between faces, mainly slots for ports and similar. Please check and see which face you are working with.

The documentation for the BIRDS3 version of this board can be found here. The documentation for the BIRDS4 version of this board can be found here. back
